suggested_fixes.enforce_server_side_authorization: Always check authorization on the server before returning object data.
suggested_fixes.use_non_guessable_ids: Use UUIDs or hashids instead of sequential integers.
suggested_fixes.implement_rbac_or_abac: Use RBAC or ABAC to enforce who can perform what action on which objects.
suggested_fixes.audit_and_rate_limit: Log access and throttle suspicious enumeration patterns.
suggested_fixes.least_privilege: Apply least privilege to users and service accounts.
